tool_description: An Amazon data API for real-time data scraping for all regional marketplaces. | Telegram Support: https://t.me/bernardko / @bernardko | Custom Plans Available
name: Parazun Amazon Data
title: Parazun Amazon Data

api_list.name: Category
api_list.description: Bulk retrieve a list of valid categories for the specified Amazon marketplace.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the 2 letter **region code** of the Amazon marketplace.

**Supported Regions**:
```
US - www.amazon.com    - United States  
CA - www.amazon.ca     - Canada
MX - www.amazon.com.mx - Mexico
BR - www.amazon.com.br - Brazil
AU - www.amazon.com.au - Australia
FR - www.amazon.fr     - France
DE - www.amazon.de     - Germany
IT - www.amazon.it     - Italy
NL - www.amazon.nl     - Netherlands
ES - www.amazon.es     - Spain
SE - www.amazon.se     - Sweden
GB - www.amazon.co.uk  - United Kingdom
PL - www.amazon.pl     - Poland
AE - www.amazon.ae     - United Arab Emirates
SA - www.amazon.sa     - Saudi Arabia
TR - www.amazon.tr     - Turkey
IN - www.amazon.in     - India
JP - www.amazon.co.jp  - Japan
SG - www.amazon.sg     - Singapore
CN - www.amazon.cn     - China
```

api_list.name: Product Search
api_list.description:
Search for products on Amazon using search terms and keywords. Optionally use Amazon's category **node_id** to limit search to that category.

Use our **GET Category API** endpoint to retrieve valid list of **node_id**(s).

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the 2 letter **region code** of the Amazon marketplace.

**Supported Regions**:
```
US - www.amazon.com    - United States  
CA - www.amazon.ca     - Canada
MX - www.amazon.com.mx - Mexico
BR - www.amazon.com.br - Brazil
AU - www.amazon.com.au - Australia
FR - www.amazon.fr     - France
DE - www.amazon.de     - Germany
IT - www.amazon.it     - Italy
NL - www.amazon.nl     - Netherlands
ES - www.amazon.es     - Spain
SE - www.amazon.se     - Sweden
GB - www.amazon.co.uk  - United Kingdom
PL - www.amazon.pl     - Poland
AE - www.amazon.ae     - United Arab Emirates
SA - www.amazon.sa     - Saudi Arabia
TR - www.amazon.tr     - Turkey
IN - www.amazon.in     - India
JP - www.amazon.co.jp  - Japan
SG - www.amazon.sg     - Singapore
CN - www.amazon.cn     - China
```

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: Enter the keywords or search terms for the product.

optional_parameters.name: books_new
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the interval to filter for newly released books. (last-30-days, last-90-days, coming-soon)

Get a list of book search results for new releases in this time interval. Works on books only.

optional_parameters.name: node_id
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the node id of the category.

Get a list of Amazon Category node_id from the category api endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Enter the page of the results for your query.

api_list.description:

api_list.name: Product Reviews
api_list.description: Request for a list of product reviews available for a specified Amazon product ASIN.

optional_parameters.name: format_type
optional_parameters.description:
Enter \"all_formats\" for reviews on all product variants.

Enter \"current_format\" for reviews for current product asin only.

optional_parameters.name: filter_by_keyword
optional_parameters.description: Enter keywords to filter reviews by. e.g. \\\"highly recommend\\\"

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Defaults to \"helpful\" to sort by helpful reviews.

Enter \"recent\" to sort by recency.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
```
US - www.amazon.com    - United States  
CA - www.amazon.ca     - Canada
MX - www.amazon.com.mx - Mexico
BR - www.amazon.com.br - Brazil
AU - www.amazon.com.au - Australia
FR - www.amazon.fr     - France
DE - www.amazon.de     - Germany
IT - www.amazon.it     - Italy
NL - www.amazon.nl     - Netherlands
ES - www.amazon.es     - Spain
SE - www.amazon.se     - Sweden
GB - www.amazon.co.uk  - United Kingdom
PL - www.amazon.pl     - Poland
AE - www.amazon.ae     - United Arab Emirates
SA - www.amazon.sa     - Saudi Arabia
TR - www.amazon.tr     - Turkey
IN - www.amazon.in     - India
JP - www.amazon.co.jp  - Japan
SG - www.amazon.sg     - Singapore
CN - www.amazon.cn     - China
```

optional_parameters.name: media_type
optional_parameters.description:
Enter \"all_contents\" for reviews with text, images and video.

Enter \"media_reviews_only\" for reviews with images and video only.

optional_parameters.name: reviewer_type
optional_parameters.description:
Defaults to \"all_reviews\" for all product reviews.

Enter \"avp_only_reviews\" for reviews with a verified purchase.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Enter the page of the results for your query.

api_list.name: Product Summaries
api_list.description:
Get a list of product summaries from Amazon using ASINs. 

This is a lightweight endpoint for requesting a list of  basic product data such as buy box price, sales, availability and rating in bulk. This is great for updating and tracking many products and is designed to be user friendly for spreadsheets such as Google Sheets.

Notes:
- The maximum limit for number of ASINs per request is 300 ASINs. 
- The maxmum number of results returned is 48 results per request, you need to paginate the request if there is more than 48 ASINs in the request.
- If a product ASIN doesn't exist anymore, it will not be returned in the results.
- If the ASIN has changed for a particular product, the new ASIN will be returned.

required_parameters.name: asins
required_parameters.description: Enter ASINs separated by a comma. (e.g. B07R6V1MXW,B07QHC1FS6,1501110365)

optional_parameters.name: all
optional_parameters.description:
Return all results at once. This parameter causes the endpoint to paginate all available pages and sort products by request order.

Set this parameter `all=1` if you want to grab all results in bulk. Default is set to 0.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Enter the page of the results for your query.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Enter the 2 letter **region code** of the Amazon marketplace. Default value is \\\"US\\\".

**Supported Regions**:
```
US - www.amazon.com    - United States  
CA - www.amazon.ca     - Canada
MX - www.amazon.com.mx - Mexico
BR - www.amazon.com.br - Brazil
AU - www.amazon.com.au - Australia
FR - www.amazon.fr     - France
DE - www.amazon.de     - Germany
IT - www.amazon.it     - Italy
NL - www.amazon.nl     - Netherlands
ES - www.amazon.es     - Spain
SE - www.amazon.se     - Sweden
GB - www.amazon.co.uk  - United Kingdom
PL - www.amazon.pl     - Poland
AE - www.amazon.ae     - United Arab Emirates
SA - www.amazon.sa     - Saudi Arabia
TR - www.amazon.tr     - Turkey
IN - www.amazon.in     - India
JP - www.amazon.co.jp  - Japan
SG - www.amazon.sg     - Singapore
CN - www.amazon.cn     - China

api_list.name: Related Product ASINs
api_list.description: Request for ASINs related to a Amazon product.
